body_html: Are there are any plans to provide binary distributions for C/C++ like you already do for C (libtensorflow-cpu-linux-x86_64-1.1.0.tar.gz)? That would be very helpful for people who want to try out C++ API.
body_text: Are there are any plans to provide binary distributions for C/C++ like you already do for C (libtensorflow-cpu-linux-x86_64-1.1.0.tar.gz)? That would be very helpful for people who want to try out C++ API.
body: Are there are any plans to provide binary distributions for C/C++ like you already do for C (`libtensorflow-cpu-linux-x86_64-1.1.0.tar.gz`)? That would be very helpful for people who want to try out C++ API.
